Posts.Content: Jan 2, 2011 02:09AM redx wrote: Hi I just had an xray and found out that I too have surgical clips left inside of me. Just let me know stuff and I will be ok but to leave me out in the dark when you know that i have been complaining about this for a year and no one would say a thing I don't get it. I was told that the pain was nerves finding each other that it was normall for the byopsy under the arm. I so sorry that I trust these people. Ok how about this count the clips before and count them before you close the patients up Oh would that be to easy mmmmmmmmmm
